Your Flame Lance and Fire Wall cause an additional 10% of their damage over 3s. Allows you to have an additional Fire Wall active, but reduces the damage of Fire Wall by 10%. Reduces the cast time of Char by 50%.

Your Flame Lance and Fire Wall cause an additional 20% of their damage over 3s. Allows you to have an additional 2 Fire Walls active, but reduces the damage of Fire Wall by 20%. Reduces the cast time of Char by 100%.

Rank.Description: Your Symbol of the Torch and Symbol of the Sun reapply if they are destroyed within 1s of being applied.
Your Symbol of the Torch and Symbol of the Sun reapply if they are destroyed within 2s of being applied.
Your Symbol of the Torch and Symbol of the Sun reapply if they are destroyed within 3s of being applied.

Rank.Description: Your single target healing and absorption spells have a 5% chance to remove Burnout.
